title: How to get merit in class 10 RBSE - Quora

response.answer_text: Board exams act as a stepping stone for our professional future. They are a test of merit and successful accomplishment of the exam takes a student to another level. Maximum quality input cannot be more than 7-8 hours. More than this will be a waste of time.You should not use help books for initial reading. At least first two readings should be from the text book.The summary should be such that on reading it the whole of the matter comes to your mind.After you finish a chapter try to attempt questions based on that chapter. You will be surprised to discover how much you missed. Read again so that you are able to answer the questions properly.Attempt all types of questions; objective, multiple choice, short answer and long answer. Take questions from previous years’ papers.Carefully remember formulae and equations. Read tougher material more often.
